gvprojects.chess.model

Class ChessPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • gvprojects.chess.model.ChessPiece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gvprojects.chess.model.IChessPiece
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook

    public class ChessPiece
extends java.lang.Object
implements gvprojects.chess.model.IChessPiece
    Parent Chess Piece class that implements IChessPiece Interface that contains general methods and helpers for checking isValidMove with rows, columns, and diagonal.
    Version:
    March 10, 2013
    Author:
    rohrj

    • Method Detail

      • isValidMove

        public boolean isValidMove(gvprojects.chess.model.Move m,
                  gvprojects.chess.model.IChessPiece[][] p)
        Method that checks the move for correct values that are on the board and a valid piece on the given board. Throws an exception if the move is off the board or the piece is not yours.
        Specified by:
        isValidMove in interface gvprojects.chess.model.IChessPiece
        Parameters:
        m - the move to be checked for validity
        p - the IChessPiece board to be checked
        Returns:
        true or false if it is a valid move
